name: Spacebug Project
description:
Spacebug

Year 2097

Humans have developed a project for a super spaceship model called Spacebug PRJ11 in order to control and ensure security in our Galaxy.

Use this elite unit to clear enemies and space debris around many places in the Galaxy including the Earth.

Embark on a journey with many levels to pass or a Sandbox mode to break your record each time you play!
